metadata.title: CVE-2019-3861 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An out of bounds read flaw was discovered in libssh2 before 1.8.1 in theway SSH packets with a padding length value greater than the packet lengthare parsed. A remote attacker who compromises a SSH server may be able tocause a Denial of Service or read data in the client memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssh2-1 - 1.8.0-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libssh2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-2.1').
